Name: Trinidad Especial
Ingredients: 10 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This deep reddy-brown bittersweet drink is based upon sweet almond syrup balancing bitter notes from the Angostura and lime tartness. With a whole shot of Angostura this cocktail is most unusual.
History: Created by Italian Barman, Valentino Bolognese and the winning drink in the Angostura European Cocktail Competition held at Mood Bar, Paris in January 2008.
Nutrition: One serving of Trinidad Especial contains 124 calories
